rukus.text: 84|1|yakhana akasa bidirna habe [1]
84|2|ara tara rabera adesa palana karabe ebam eta'i tara karaniya [1].
84|3|Ara yakhana yaminake samprasarita kara habe [1].
84|4|Ara yamina tara abhyantare ya ache ta ba'ire niksepa karabe o sun'yagarbha habe [1]
84|5|ebam tara rabera adesa palana karabe eta'i tara karaniya [1].
84|6|He manusa! Tumi tomara rabera kache paucha paryanta kathora parisrama karate habe, atahpara tumi tamra saksata labha karabe [1].
84|7|Atahpara yake tara â€˜amalanama tara dana hate deya habe
84|8|tara hiseba-nikesa sahaje'i neya habe [1]
84|9|ebam se tara sbajanadera kache [1] praphullacitte phire yabe
84|10|ara yake tara â€˜amalanama tara pithera pichanadika theke deya habe
84|11|se abasya'i tara dhbansa dakabe
84|12|ebam jbalanta agune dagdha habe
84|13|niscaya se tara sbajanadera madhye anande chila
84|14|Se to bhabate ye, se kakhane'i phire yabe na [1]
84|15|hyam, [1] niscaya tara raba tara upara samyaka drsti danakari.
84|16|Atahpara ami sapatha karachi [1] pascima akasera
84|17|ara sapatha ratera ebam ta ya kichura samabesa ghataya tara
84|18|ebam sapatha camdera, yakhana ta purna haya
84|19|abasya'i tomara eka stara theke an'ya stare arohana karabe [1].
84|20|Atahpara tadera ki hala ye, tara imana ane na
84|21|ara yakhana tadera kache kura'ana patha kara haya takhana tara sajda kare na [1]
84|22|baram kaphirara mithyaropa kare.
84|23|Ara tara ya posana kare allah ta sabisesa abagata.
84|24|Kaje'i apani taderake yantranadayaka sastira sambada dina
84|25|kintu yara imana ane o satkaja kare tadera jan'ya rayeche nirabacchinna puraskara.
